location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Circular from William Newnham, Secretary to the Government at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Printed circular from William Newnham, Secretary to the Government at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, on the Regulation for the Purvoes Fund for European and Native Clerks.In enclosure, 'Regulation for the Purvoes Fund', dated 25 September, passed by the Governor General.
